modName: Anime Main Menu Replacer - DELETED - DELETED
summary: Changes the Main menu to a more anime themed one.
descriptionHtml:
Anime Main Menu Replacer
------------------------

I felt like making this main menu for my love for anime and any anime fans out there.


Installation
------------

Extract the folders to your Data folder of Skyrim for example: C:\Program Files\Skyrim\Data
Overwrite files if asked and enjoy!

All done!


Uninstallation
--------------

Delete the files that was in the Rar (not the folders).


Details
-------

Main Menu Screen is from Hatsune Miku Wich is a really nice one.

Music is from Ryo called Liar's Parade and Hatsune Miku is singing.


Credits
-------

Made by Rizumu (miyuutje)
Thanks to Ryo for making the music.

Tools used :

Photoshop CS5
Nifskope
MultiXwm


~Have Fun! Hope you like it!
author: Rizumu
